
```{r}
#| label = "{{DataName}}.lm"
{{DataName}}.lm = lm({{ResponseName}} ~ {{Factor1Name}}*{{Factor2Name}}*{{Factor3Name}}, data = {{DataName}})
{{DataName}}.lm |> anova()
```
